item.description:
Why not take a moment and catch our breath at Gouveia Vineyards after the Holidays. Let's meet up ...sit for a while and just enjoy the new year together...share a glass of wine and toast the coming year.

Sunday is the perfect day to do it...end of the holiday season...beginning of the new year. Let's meet up with old friends, and new, for good conversation and share a laugh or two.

Bring an appetizer to share or get rid of some of those leftovers. We'll share some food, raise a glass and make some memories. Hope to see you then
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup Sign...
item.name: Let's All Meet @ Gouveia Vineyards....
